Package lapr.controller

Class CreateTransactionController

java.lang.Object
lapr.controller.CreateTransactionController
public class CreateTransactionController
extends java.lang.Object
Class that is responsible for creating a new transaction and adding to tha transaction list of the organization.
Author:
AndrÃ© Botelho and Ricardo Moreira.

    • newTransaction

      public boolean newTransaction​(java.lang.String id, Freelancer freelancer, Task task, java.time.LocalDate endDate, double hoursDelay, java.lang.String description)
      Creates a new transaction.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the transaction.
      freelancer - The freelancer who executed the task.
      task - The task that was executed.
      endDate - The date the task was executed.
      hoursDelay - The days the task execution was delayed.
      description - A short description of the work.
      Returns:
      True if the new transaction is valid, false otherwise.

    • addTransaction

      public boolean addTransaction()
      Should be called only if newTransaction was successful.
      Returns:
      True if the new task was added, false otherwise.

    • getAmount

      public double getAmount()
      Should be called only if newTransaction was successful.
      Returns:
      The amount in euros to pay for the transaction;
